entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
